table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_item_langmanagement` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `language` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `variable` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `translation` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `module` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `translationtype` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `action` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
